project.name: CMOS v1.0
project.description: Context + Mission Orchestration System - Simple, powerful context management for AI-assisted development

critical_facts: CMOS provides context management through domain compartmentalization
Smart compression achieves 4x-10x reduction based on state
Health monitoring uses statistical metrics for real-time assessment
Component Set IV (progression, navigation, contextual feedback) is staged for Sprint 18 delivery with multi-brand + accessibility requirements captured in R18.1
decisions_made: Removed protocol suite dependency for v1.0 simplicity
Self-contained statistical metrics for health monitoring
Graceful degradation for all advanced features
Roadmap realigned: Sprint 19 pivots to design-system hardening and packaging dry run, Sprint 20 prepares a private release review (brownfield pilot deferred post-review)
Add Sprint 19 display-site research mission to identify low-maintenance external showcase options
Select GitHub Pages as the initial Storybook hosting approach for Sprint 19 deployment work
Guardrail automation now updates diagnostics and state artifacts (metadata, tenancy, token governance)
achievements: Clean v1.0 release without external dependencies
Simple migration tool for existing projects
State assessment now supports a breaking-token-label shortcut via pnpm state:token-breaking

integration_points: context/cmos/ - JavaScript modules for advanced features
smart_migrate.js - migration tool for existing projects

current_sprint.focus: Component Set IV delivery + performance harness automation

next_sprint_ready.focus: Design system hardening, packaging readiness, and Storybook display deployment (no external pilot)

upcoming_review.notes: Prepare reviewer kit, feedback intake, and pause for go/no-go before public launch

state_assessment.notes: Run before each planning review to refresh assessment.json/assessment.md

checklist_next_session: Kick off B19.4 diagnostics refresh using the new guardrail snapshots and perf baselines.
Verify CI pipelines surface the metadata/tenancy lint rules (update `.github/workflows/pr-validate.yml` as needed).
Schedule a guardrail spot-check (`node scripts/state-assessment.mjs --guardrails`) before reviewer hand-off.
Finalize GitHub Pages deployment plan for B19.5 (domain selection, workflow wiring).
Capture reviewer enablement prerequisites for Sprint 20 private RC ahead of the next review.
planning_context.notes: Planning cadence: deliver Sprint 18 Component Set IV + perf harness, run refreshed state assessment, then transition into Sprint 19 hardening (polish, packaging dry run, guardrails, diagnostics, Storybook display deployment) before staging Sprint 20 private review.
